tool.name: Sample Level Metrics RNA
tool.description: Metrics calculated at the sample RNA metrics, for use in CGD and for additional QC.

param.name: counts
param.label: Counts from STAR
param.help: This is the tabular count output from RNA STAR reads_per_gene.tab

param.name: tpm
param.label: TPM from Counts using a filtered GTF
param.help: TPM converted from htseq-count with the gtf, which is Homo_sapiens.GRCh37.75_filt_truseq-rna-exome-targets.gtf. ref_GRCh37.p13.truseq-rna-exome-targets.gtf. This gtf is the ref_GRCh37.p13_top_level.gff3, filtered by common chromosomes converted to a gtf, and bedtools intersected with truseq-rna-exome-targeted-regions-manifest-v1-2. Can also be a common gtf.

param.name: hk_file
param.label: Housekeeping Gene List
param.help: List of house keeping genes to include

tool.help: Metrics calculated at the sample level metrics for RNA, for use in CGD and for additional QC.
